commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Heh heh heh... I've gotten so many comments from everyone. I truly am loved by all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh? What's with the long face? Come and have a look at this! We're getting so much praise for the live show we put together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm sorry I wasn't much help to you!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh?! What's up with you all of a sudden?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We didn't see much of an increase in fan club applications. I should've come up with a better plan!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What are you saying? My fan base increased by ten people!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I mean, sure, that's nowhere near the number of Ai Pals or Ayumu Uehara Fan Club members. *Laugh*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But it's strange. I don't really feel upset about it. In fact, I'm actually rather happy.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: At first, I wanted more and more people to join, but as I interacted with everyone in my fan club, my feelings started to change.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: There really are people who think I'm cute, who love me, and who cheer for me. I want to do my absolute best as a school idol for these very people!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi... You really must be the most wonderful school idol in the whole country if you care about your fan club members so much!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I knew you'd say that! *Giggle* I get so energized when you praise me!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, that's right! Have a look at this! I made membership cards for my fan club members!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow, they're adorable. What are they made out of? They sparkle with all the colors of the rainbow. They're perfect for you, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You can't be more right. They're modeled after me, the idol who sparkles with all the different colors.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I was thinking about giving these to everyone who joined later... But before that! I will present the very first one to you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What? Me? I can't believe I'm the first to have one! I'm so happy!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hee hee hee. I bet you are!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It wouldn't be right for me to accept this before any of your fan club members, so...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I won't take no for an answer! It's yours, whether you like it or not!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ...Okay, then I'll gratefully accept it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Here you go! Your glorious membership card as member 001 of the Kasumin Fan Club! Make sure you cherish it forever!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course I will! This makes me so happy. I'll carry it with me every day.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Every day?! O-Oh you! Why are you always so quick to bring me joy like that?! That's totally unfair!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Is it unfair? S-Sorry.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww! C'mon! I want to be the one who brings joy! I'm gonna become the best school idol around and bring joy to you and all of my fan club members!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Is that so? Then I'll keep on supporting you so you can become the best school idol around and make me and your fan club members happy!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Thanks! I need you by my side in my sparkling future, so I'm counting on you!
